title: Running Local LLMs on Mac mini M1 16GB RAM
content: DeepSeek released some distilled models like 1.4b, 7b, 14b, 32b.
Found that 1.4b, 7b, and 14b works on 16GB ram, but 32b requires more ram and as the result more swaping between ram and disk and finally got slow token output.
1.4b is fasest but ususaly output some illusion answers.

title: The Impact of RAM Frequency on FPS: Valorant
content: The game Valorant does not require high perforamnce graphic cards, but it require two channel ram speed.
Overclocking and buying two new higher speed ram are both good ways to improve in game FPS.

title: Mac Pro 2013
content: I bought two Mac Pro 2013 at Viginia Tech auction. Configuration: Xeon E5-1620 v2, Dual AMD FirePro D300 with 2GB of GDDR5 VRAM each, 16GB x4 DDR3 1866 MT/s.
After seraching online, knowing that this model can support a maximum of 128GB RAM. However, due to the memory controller bottleneck, the memory frequency will be reduced to 1333 MT/s.
